transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Namaste, namaskar, Aditya baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Sir, aapne kal 9696 mein call kiya tha sir.
Customer: Parso matlab.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hello sir.
Customer: Sir aapne call mara number change.
Executive: Matlab apna IndiaMART ke help mein wo customer care pe aapne call kiya tha na sir.
Customer: Achha, haan haan call kiya tha.
Executive: Haan ji sir, to usme kya doubt tha aapko.
Customer: Wahi check kar raha tha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir aapke paas to mera bhi number provide tha sir to lekin aapne usse call kiya.
Customer: Nahi main wahi check kar raha tha kya baat hui.
Customer: Haan usko bol do na.
Customer: Haan, theek hai bol do, baki hum karte hai dekhta hu.
Customer: Haan bhaiya boliye.
Executive: Sir main keh raha hu ki aapne matlab wahi cheez matlab.
Customer: Hello, aawaz aa rahi hai?
Executive: Ji ji aa rahi hai.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan sir nahi aa rahi hai aapki aawaz.
Executive: Aapne sir 9696 pe kyun call kiya tha sir, aapke paas to mera number bhi tha sir.
Customer: Nahi main directly call kiya tha IndiaMART helpline number likha hua tha usme.
Customer: Save karke rakha hua tha.
Executive: Haan haan main samajh raha hu.
Executive: Main samajh raha hu sir helpline number likha hua tha but aap jab agar desktop se jab use karte hai to waha niche mera bhi naam likha rehta hai aapka as a account manager sir. Aap connect kiye hote sir main to baitha hi rehta hu usme kya hai sir. Aapne waha helpline number diye kya sir aapne connect kar diya wo alag cheez hai.
Customer: Theek hai koi baat nahi. Lekin main bata raha hu ki agar aapko account se related koi bhi dikkat hoti hai to aap mujhe connect kiya kariye sir aapka account manager main hi hu sir. Aur main hi aapki ye cheeze resolve karunga jaise aapne connect kiya waha pe baat hua sir aapka but baad mein hume bola hume hi bola jata hai ki aap isse call back kariye ki aap baat kariye. Aapne waha pe aapka call concern unhone kiya hai sir lekin concern log ko hum hi sunenge sir wo aapke kya discussion hua hoga jaha tak mujhe lagta hai. Present time mein jo buyleads aapki usse aa rahi thi hogi wo discussion aapse ki gayi hogi right.
Customer: Aur jo cheeze aapne mujhe already bata rakhi hai wo cheeze aapne dobara batai hogi.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Aapko Jharkhand mein deal karna hai to Jharkhand ki buyleads mujhe chahiye hai na.
Customer: Ji theek hai sir, Jamshedpur Jamshedpur Jharkhand ki ek buylead aa rakhi hai. Theek hai abhi abhi aa rakhi hai 12 minute hua hai. Isko thoda dekh lijiye ACTP sign board karke hai. Theek hai aur ye quality jo hai 9.1 nahi 198 square feet ka hai order value jo hai 1 lakh se 1 lakh 43000 business use ke liye hai. Banda 8 saal se IndiaMART pe hai yahi sab use karta hai. Sign board mein hi deal karta hai wo. To ek baar isse baat kar lijiye dekhiye ki kya hai sir to abhi abhi jyada purani nahi hui hai. Abhi abhi aayi hui hai buylead 12 minute hua hai mujhe 12 kya ho jayega 13 se 14 minute ho jayega abhi. Isko dekh lijiye ek baar isko concern kijiye isko recent pe jayiyega theek hai aur category jo waha pe hai na sir filter lagane ka location pe jo filter lagane ka option hai waha pe sir Jharkhand ka location lagayega to aa jayega samne.
Customer: To aisa karte hai na hum aapko call karte hai theek hai 3 baje ke aas paas theek hai. Profile wagera bol rahe ho ki profile wagera aap edit wagera kiye the.
Executive: Haan sir edit kiye the aapka kuch catalog ka jo jo mapping oping hai wo idhar udhar tha to mapping humne change ki thi wo bhi main bata bhi raha hu kaunsi mapping humne sahi ki thi aapki. Aapki maine mapping mein sir ye jo aapke do teen photos add kiye the 3D 3D outdoor sign board jo hai sir usme bahar se maine do photos add kiye the sir uske baad aapka matlab dekh raha tha main ki kaun kaun se mein aur cheeze add karni hai jaise aapka sir ye retro sign board karke aluminium retro sign board karke iski maine mapping sahi ki thi sign board nahi laga hua tha isme. Fir aapka sir do products aur hai unke main naam bata raha hu ek minute dijiyega mujhe. Kaha gaya ye.
Executive: Ek second sir aapki 3D wale jo photos hai usme kya hai ek hi photo lagi hui thi aur photo jo hai thoda idhar udhar lagi hui thi to maine photos bhi change kiye the sir. Aisa nahi hai ki aapne maine work nahi kiya tha isliye main naam batata hu maine jo catalog bhi aapka increase kiya tha.
Executive: Ek minute sir bata raha hu aapko. Haan 3D sign board LED sign board in dono ka sir maine catalog mapping in dono ki sahi ki thi.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji ji ji sun rahe hai.
Executive: Main keh raha hu sir 3D outdoor sign board jo hai aapka outdoor sign board aur LED sign board jo hai uski na jo jo catalog score tha wo 45 tha sir isko maine increase kiya tha plus iski mapping maine sahi ki thi.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai. Humne wo cheeze sahi ki thi aur baki hum log aisa karte hai 3 baje ke aas paas hum log baithte hai jo changes wagera.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Theek hai koi dikkat nahi, theek hai sir. Aur request hai sir agar koi bhi dikkat raha kare to mujhe call kiya kariye sir. Kyunki wo bhi hamare paas bhi.
Executive: Haan wahi cheez hamare paas bhi aata hai sir call lekin baad mein aata hai ye cheez hota hai sir.
Customer: Chaliye theek hai, theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer called helpline instead of account manager.

- Wants Jharkhand buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained benefits of calling account manager.

- Executive provided details of a recent Jharkhand buylead.

- Executive informs about catalog mapping changes.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back at 3 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, account manager, catalog, mapping
